Index.title: Hello world!
Index.textHome: With over 20 years of experience as a developer, I have been specializing in React.js for the past 5 years. My expertise lies in the popular frameworks Next.js and Gatsby. For headless CMS solutions, I primarily work with Strapi, Contentful, and Sanity. Leveraging my extensive knowledge and skills, I deliver high-quality solutions tailored to meet your unique requirements.
